meanings.definition: To defeat decisively in a competition or conflict
meanings.sent1: The champion boxer thrashes his opponent in the ring, winning the match.
meanings.sent2: The chess grandmaster thrashes his rival in a strategic battle of wits.
meanings.sent3: The team thrashes their opponents in the final game of the season, securing the championship.
meanings.sent4: The superhero thrashes the villain, putting an end to their evil plans.
meanings.sent5: The army thrashes the enemy forces, claiming victory in the decisive battle.
